plot: A journey of discussion bringing out the anxieties, laments and grievances of a cross section of people from the Tamil community, ranging from eruditions to politicians to former Tamil militants.
title: Shadows of a Wind
plot_es: A journey of discussion bringing out the anxieties, laments and grievances of a cross section of people from the Tamil community, ranging from eruditions to politicians to former Tamil militants.
plot_en: A journey of discussion bringing out the anxieties, laments and grievances of a cross section of people from the Tamil community, ranging from eruditions to politicians to former Tamil militants.
